definitions.definition: Alternate , or responsive singing by a choir split into two parts; a piece sung or chanted in this manner.
Alternate, or responsive ideas or opinions ; juxtaposition .
Synonym of apophony ( “ contrastive vowel modification ” ) .

main_definition: ( music , singing ) Alternate , or responsive singing by a choir split into two parts; a piece sung or chanted in this manner.
secondary_definitions: Alternate, or responsive ideas or opinions ; juxtaposition .
( phonetics ) Synonym of apophony ( “ contrastive vowel modification ” ) .
